title: Member @amFOSS
description: I am an active member of the amFOSS club at my college. I have been contributing to various open-source projects and have been a part of the organizing team for various events.

title: Undergraduate
description: I am currently pursuing my undergraduate degree in Computer Science and Engineering with specialization in Aritificial Intelligence from Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham.

title: High School
description: I completed my high school year from P.S. Senior Secondary School with most of my time devoted to competitive examinations. I achieved a lot of recognition for my academic record
